duck: Ising model, mathematical model of ferromagnetism in statistical mechanics
Rudolf Ising, animator for MGM, together with Hugh Harman often credited as: Harman-Ising

wiki.text:
'Ising' is a surname. Notable people with the surname include:

* Ernst Ising (1900–1998), German physicist
* Gustav Ising, Swedish accelerator physicist
* Rudolf Ising, animator for MGM, together with Hugh Harman often credited as:
  Harman-Ising
wiki.title: ising
